Key Match Events: Hardik Pandya smashed 39 runs off 16 deliveries as India cruised past the target of 128 with 49 deliveries left and seven wickets in hand.
Varun Chakravarthy and Arshdeep Singh took 3 wickets apiece as Bangladesh were skittled out for just 127.
Pre-Game Insights: Suryakumar Yadav won the toss and opted to nbowl first in the first of the three-match T20I series at the New Madhavrao Scindia Cricket Stadium in Gwalior on Sunday.
Mayank Yadav and Nitish Kumar Reddy have been handed debut caps.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the New Madhavrao Scindia Cricket Stadium in Gwalior.
